sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"让，允许"之意。
means: allow ：普通用词，侧重听任、默许或不加阻止。在正式场合可用来表客气的请求。
let ：常用词，用于各种非正式场合，语气最弱，指允许或无力阻止某事，暗示漠不关心或听之任之。
permit ：正式用词，在多数场合可与allow换用，语义最强，指准许某人做某事，含权威或正式的意味。
authorize ：语气最强，指权威性的允许与认可。

sentence.Network_en: We are willing to authorize the president to use force if necessary.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们愿意授权总统在必要的时候使用武力。

sentence.Network_en: He said that he needed to get his supervisor to authorize my refund.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说必须让主管人员批准我的退款.

sentence.Network_en: It would certainly be within his power to authorize a police raid like that.
sentence.Network_cn: 他绝对有权批准那样的一次警方突袭行动。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Authority 权威权力 Authorize 批准 Authorized Unpriced Work 批准的未定价工作.
商务英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... authentic text 正本 authorize 批准;核定; 认可 authorized dealer 特约经销商;授权经销商.
职称英语考试综合类A级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... authority n. 权力，权威， authorize vt. 授权，委托，许可，批准 automate vt. 使自动化.
张红岩 - 豆丁网 ... bar n. 法院 authorize vt. 授权与,批准,委托代替 empower vt. 授予权力,允许,使能够.

list.abs: 人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... belong to 属于 author 作家 picnic 野餐.
花语_互动百科 ... 万能（ Almighty） 权威（authority）（ Authority） 白日梦（ Daydream）.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... author n. 作者，作家 authority n. 权力,权威,威信, 官方 automatic a. 自动的，机械的.
那么授权（Authorization）又是什么呢？授权通常是用来回答以下问题：用户A是否被授权访问资源R 用户A是否被授权执行P操作

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French autoriser, from medieval Latin auctorizare, from auctor 'originator, promoter' (see author)

entry.def: If someone in a position of authority authorizes something, they give their official permission for it to happen.

example.ex: It would certainly be within his power to authorize a police raid like that...
example.tran: 他绝对有权批准那样的一次警方突袭行动。

example.ex: We are willing to authorize the president to use force if necessary.
example.tran: 我们愿意授权总统在必要的时候使用武力。

sentences.sentence: "The rock star never authorized this slanderous biography"

means.word_mean: 2. give or delegate power or authority to;

sentences.sentence: "She authorized her assistant to sign the papers"

auth_sentence.content: Congress could authorize one or more SROs to oversee advisers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Congress could authorize one or more SROs to oversee advisers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Congress could authorize one or more SROs to oversee advisers.

auth_sentence.content: The filing was signed by Councilwoman Susan Wilson after a 4-3 vote late Tuesday by the council to authorize it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The filing was signed by Councilwoman Susan Wilson after a 4-3 vote late Tuesday by the council to authorize it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The filing was signed by Councilwoman Susan Wilson after a 4-3 vote late Tuesday by the council to authorize it.

auth_sentence.content: People made conscious decisions to authorize wars in Afghanistan and Iraq and not pay for them.
auth_sentence.res_content: People made conscious decisions to authorize wars in Afghanistan and Iraq and not pay for them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People made conscious decisions to authorize wars in Afghanistan and Iraq and not pay for them.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,表示"……化,做等"; 2. 表名词,"物品,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+erc力量+ise物品,状态→n.练习,习题;训练,锻练
merchand=merchant商人+ise物品,状态→商人的东西→商品
mort死+ise物品,状态→木头敲进榫眼便使不再动摇
treat治疗,研究+ise物品,状态→n.论文
turquo=turkish土耳其的+ise物品,状态→绿松石来自土耳其而出名
author作家+ise……化,做等→允许其写作→许可,批准
authorise[v.授权,委任;许可,批准]→v.授权,批准
critic批评家+ise……化,做等→v.批评,批判
ex出+erc力量+ise……化,做等→v.训练,锻练;行使
fertile肥沃的+ise……化,做等→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ise……化,做等→重新活

means.word_mean: 授权, 批准; 委托

sentences.en: The government authorized an irrigation project.
sentences.cn: 政府批准了一项灌溉工程。

sentences.en: We are authorized to receive contributions for the Red Cross.
sentences.cn: 我们受托接受给红十字会的捐助。

jushi.english: The government authorized an irrigation project.
jushi.chinese: 政府批准了一项灌溉工程。

jushi.english: We are authorized to receive contributions for the Red Cross.
jushi.chinese: 我们受托接受给红十字会的捐助。
